mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( title, user_id, content, tag ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{tag} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no, b.title, b.user_id, u.nickname, b.content, b.join_cnt, b.reg_date, b.upd_date FROM board b, users u WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} AND b.user_id = u.user_id

SELECT b.board_no ,b.title ,IFNULL( u.user_id, '삭제된 계정입니다.') AS user_id ,b.content ,b.join_cnt ,b.reg_date ,b.upd_date, b.tag FROM board b LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id = b.user_id WHERE (
b.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{option.keyword},'%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{option.keyword},'%') OR b.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{option.keyword},'%')
b.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{option.keyword},'%')
b.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{option.keyword},'%')
b.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{option.keyword},'%') OR b.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{option.keyword},'%')
b.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{option.keyword},'%')
) ORDER BY reg_date DESC LIMIT #{page.index}, #{page.rowsPerPage}

SELECT count(*) FROM board b LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id = b.user_id WHERE b.board_no > 0 AND (
b.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{option.keyword},'%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{option.keyword},'%') OR b.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{option.keyword},'%')
b.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{option.keyword},'%')
b.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{option.keyword},'%')
b.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{option.keyword},'%') OR b.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{option.keyword},'%')
u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{option.keyword},'%')
)
